verses.content: Aw Pathien, lâwmthu kan hril che, Lâwmthu kan hril che, i hming a hnai sih a; Mihaiin i thilmakthaw thuhai chu an hril hlak.
Hun ruot chu ka hmu pha chun, Indiktakin ro rêl ka tih.
Hnuoi le a chunga um po pohai chu an intuihmang zo tah: Keiin a banhai chu ka phun a nih.
Mi uonghai kuoma chun, “Iengleangin um naw ro,” ka tih a, Mi rilohai kuomah, “In ki suk- sâng naw ro,” ka ti bawk a.
In ki chu chungtieng suksâng naw unla, Rîng tlûn pumin ṭawng naw ro.
Suksângna chu saktienga inthawk a ni nawh, thlangtienga inthawk a ni bawk nawh. Simtienga inthawk hlak a ni bawk nawh.
Pathien chu rorêltu a ni lem: Ama chun pakhat a suktlâwm a, pakhat a suksâng hlak.
LALPA kuta chun no a um sih a, a uoin chu a phul a, Thil dang le chawkpawlin a sip a, chutaka inthawk chu a bunsuok a. Matheiloin a nenghai chen chun hnuoia mi rilohai chun dâwn fai rêt an tih.
Nisienlakhawm, kei chun chu kumkhuoin inhriettir ka ta, Jakob Pathien chu inpâkin hla sak ka tih.
Mi rilohai ki po po khawm chu tanpêk ka ta, Mi felhai ki ruok chu suksângin um a tih.
